QuestData.Title: Souls for Sinfall
QuestData.Description:
Baine suffers within Torghast, but at least we know that he yet lives.
Rushing to his rescue would prove disastrous without a plan of attack. I will see to preparing one.
In the meantime, I suggest you bring the souls you rescued back to Sinfall.
Denathrius's machinations have left the venthyr poorly provisioned, and Prince Renathal will require all the souls he can muster.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return the souls rescued from the Maw to Tenaval in Sinfall within Revendreth.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Tenaval in Sinfall within Revendreth.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ah, so you were successful. As I knew you would be.
Now, let us put these souls to use.
